Header.title: Sarcasm Detector
Header.paragraph: Now identify sarcasm at the click of a button.

About.paragraph: The goal of this project is to identify sarcasm in plain English text.The project plans to exploit the property of a general sarcastic statement of possessing contrasting sentiments by using Natural Language Processing.The project aims at training a model to predict if a given statement is sarcastic or a regular sentence.The model will accept input text from the end user and display whether it is sarcastic or not.
Why: We enhance the User experience on social media
Why2: We have a Large Self-Annotated Corpus for Sarcasm

Testimonials.text: "It was truly useful for our company, it helped us to weed out the sarcastic reviews."
Testimonials.name: Justin Chittapilly

Testimonials.text: "I was constantly bullied for not able to understand sarcasm, this application helped me a lot."
Testimonials.name: Justin Bandekar

Testimonials.text: "Very useful website! It helped me understand sarcasm and how to use it properly and smartly."
Testimonials.name: Justin Bawankule

Testimonials.text: "Amazing and user friendly UI. I suggest it to all my friends and family."
Testimonials.name: Justin Albuquerque

Testimonials.text: "The results of the analysis are so amazing that even a person like me with zero sense of humour can now understand sarcasm."
Testimonials.name: Justin Beiber

Testimonials.text: "This website helped me a lot to understand Russian memes. Now I am in love with sarcasm and Russian memes."
Testimonials.name: Justin Иванов

Features.title: Instant Text Detection
Features.text: To detect sarcasm in English texts we are implementing a deep learning neural network model developed using TensorFlow.

Features.title: Contextual Detection
Features.text: A training dataset containing sarcastic and non sarcastic texts from Kaggle is used for implementing the model.

Features.title: Deep Learning
Features.text: Perfect analysis and understanding of the sarcasm sentences can improve the accuracy of sentiment analysis.

Features.title: Comprehensive Dataset
Features.text: The dataset contains 25000 clean sarcastic tweets and about 100000 clean non sarcastic tweets.
